snippet: Olesya Syreva, a European indoor silver medalist from Russia, was barred for two years for breaking antidoping regulations, the Russian athletics federation said.
abstract: Russian runner Olesya Syreva is barred from sport for two years for breaking antidoping regulations.
lead_paragraph: Olesya Syreva, a European indoor silver medalist from Russia, was barred for two years for breaking antidoping regulations, the Russian athletics federation said.
